description: The narrative unfolds amidst Turkish and Persian contexts, and we’ve chosen to present it in Egyptian colloquial dialect to reflect its Egyptian dramatic essence: Peter Mimi
title: The Assassins series: Debate over language choice

description: A landmark survey by RegTech Africa and Agpaytech exposes a dramatic surge in African consumers’ preference for digital payments. The study, titled “African Digital Payment Systems and Consumers’ Experience in 2023,” surveyed 2,591 individuals across various regions, revealing a resounding 91% favour digital transactions over traditional cash. This data highlights a seismic shift in Africa’s […]
title: Africa goes digital: Survey reveals overwhelming shift towards cashless transactions

description: Egypt’s Minister of Transportation, Kamel El-Wazir, recently inspected progress on the Alexandria Metro Phase 1 project, a critical step towards a greener and more sustainable transportation network for the historic city. Spanning 21.7 kilometers from Abu Qir Railway Station to Misr Station, the project features 20 stations, with a mix of 6.5 kilometers of surface-level […]
title: Alexandria embraces green future with Phase 1 of Metro project

description: HC Brokerage releases update on Egypt’s real estate sector
title: HELI shifts to revenue-sharing deals amidst execution challenges: HC Analysis

description: The Ministry of Planning and Economic Development has unveiled a new approach for assessing private sector investments, revealing a surge in both the amount and proportion of private investments in Egypt. In its pursuit of enhancing the national accounts system, the Ministry has developed a new method for quantifying private investments. This initiative is part […]
title: Forecast for private investment to hit EGP 600bn in FY 2023/2024: Planning Ministry

description: GMG sets sights on extensive growth of VF Corporation’s brand stores
title: GMG, VF Corporation strengthen alliance to broaden reach in MENA, SEA regions
